name: Not Of This World
description:
Welcome to Oddwind Park!
Become this being that knows nothing but to follow it's urge to feed on people. Use everything you can find in the park to conceal and disguise while preying on unsuspecting park strollers who came to enjoy the beautiful scenery of Oddwind Park.


How long can you survive, till you find out the truth behind all this.

FEATURES:

  • 2 Endings, the next play-through will be affected depending on it.
  • Each park strollers have different reaction towards you. Make sure to learn them in able to survive longer.
  • Keep your inventory stocked up, you'll never know when you'll need a disguise.
  • There's a boss at the end.
  • 5 mini games to unlock.
  • Enjoy the gorgeous pixel eye candy graphic style.
  • Awesome music!
